name: Astro Exhibitions
tag_list: exhibitions, esxhibition-stands, exhibition-design, exhibition-stand-design, exhibition-stand-designers, exhibition-stand-builders
overview:
Astro Exhibitions are an exhibition stand design and construction company based just outside Manchester.

We have been designing and building exhibition stands for companies from all over the world since 2002, and have created stands for all areas of industry, from pharmaceuticals to education to hospitality.

Alongside the exhibition stand design and construction, Astro provide a fully managed service. We oversee all aspects of the project from initial design ideas to transport, takedown and storage of exhibition stands after events.

We work closely with our clients to ensure our designs meet their needs and objectives, and we pride ourselves on the fact that many of our clients return to us year after year for their exhibit design.
